    • moveAgents

      private static void moveAgents​(game_service game, directed_weighted_graph gg)
      Moves each of the agents along the edge, in case the agent is on a node the next destination (next edge) is chosen by an algorithm in NextNode method.
      Parameters:
      game - represents the gane server
      gg - represents the graph

    • nextNode

      private static int nextNode​(directed_weighted_graph g, int src, CL_Agent agent)
      Move the agents according to a wise algorithm. Each agent move to the closest pokemon which unselected by another agent. If the agent is closet to the highest valued edge and his speed is at most 4, the agent move to that edge instead.
      Parameters:
      g - represents the graph
      src - represents the current node of the agent
      Returns:
      the destination node of the current agent

    • locateAgents

      public static void locateAgents​(directed_weighted_graph gg, java.util.List<CL_Pokemon> pokemons)
      Locate the agents on the graph next to the highest valued pokemons.
      Parameters:
      gg - represents the graph
      pokemons - represents the list of pokemons

    • findPokemonSrc

      public static int findPokemonSrc​(directed_weighted_graph g, CL_Pokemon p)
      Finds the node which we need to get in order to eat the pokemon.
      Parameters:
      g - represents the graph
      p - represents the given pokemon.
      Returns:
      the found node key, returns -1 if the node cannot be found.

    • nodeOfPokemons

      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​CL_Pokemon> nodeOfPokemons​(directed_weighted_graph g)
      Connects each pokemon to his edge source node.
      Parameters:
      g - represents the graph
      Returns:
      an hash map of nodes and their pokemons.

      Returns:

    • distToPokemon

      private static boolean distToPokemon​(CL_Agent agent, CL_Pokemon p)
      An auxiliary function that calculates the distance between an agent and a Pokemon
      Parameters:
      agent - represent the agent
      p - represents the pokemon
      Returns:
      true if the agent has epsilon distance from the Pokemon.
